body_html:
This works for me without any changes to the cmake files with the new 2018 version on macos

source /opt/intel/bin/compilervars.sh intel64
CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=$CPATH  CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=$LIBRARY_PATH python3 setup.py build
body_text:
This works for me without any changes to the cmake files with the new 2018 version on macos
source /opt/intel/bin/compilervars.sh intel64
CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=$CPATH  CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=$LIBRARY_PATH python3 setup.py build
body:
This works for me without any changes to the cmake files with the new 2018 version on macos

```bash
source /opt/intel/bin/compilervars.sh intel64
CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=$CPATH  CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH=$LIBRARY_PATH python3 setup.py build
```
